author: Tomas Petrašiūnas
title: Bluetooth Speaker In A Football
text:
Bluetooth Speaker In A Football Posted Yesterday 
BRO Ball is waterproof, Bluetooth speaker designed as both a speaker to play music and a football to play catch. It allows to put your music in a game. Ball connects to your phone or other device from up to 45 meters away. 
Tech specs It has a built in battery that charges via USB connection just like your phone. It can also be used to charge your phone or other device. It glow-in-the-dark outlining. It’s weight is evenly distributed to allow for easy spiral throws. 

The project campaign is on the Kickstarter an estimated delivery is on Jun of 2016.
